entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 1:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 46 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: W 18 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
